Package curam.util.cache

This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam Cache service.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cache<K,V> A cache.
CacheEntry<V> Immutable view to an entry in the cache.
CacheEvictionApprover<K,V> An eviction approver adds another level of control over the eviction of items from the cache.
CacheGroup Manages a set of caches that share certain characteristics (replication strategy, disk store root path, default cache configuration...).
CacheGroupFactory Factory for cache groups.
CacheListener<K> Listener for cache events.
CacheLoader<K,V> A cache loader is responsible to load objects when they are not found in the cache.
 

Class Summary
CacheInvalidationMessage<K> This class holds the details for a cache invalidation message.
CacheLoaderAdapter<K,V> An adapter to simplify the development of cache loaders.
CacheManager This is the entry point for clients using the caching service.
CacheStatistics Cache statistics.
CacheStatistics.Statistics Basic cache statistics.
 

Enum Summary
CacheStatistics.Accuracy Statistics accuracy.
 

Package curam.util.cache Description

This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam Cache service.
